definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: They must have strong longings that lures them to attend MEC.
sentences.chinese: 他们一定有很强烈的渴望促使他们参加英语角。

sentences.english: Q11: What about English corner, wouldn't that help?
sentences.chinese: 我老去英语角有帮助吗？

sentences.english: I have to go to the English Corner tomorrow evening.
Are there any English Corner in Daliang?
Last Sunday, I went to the Mount Lao with MEC members.
sentences.chinese: 上周日我同移动英语角的成员们去了崂山。

sentences.english: Besides, they also seek out English corners and practice their English a lot.
sentences.chinese: 而且他们都设法找到英语角去多多地练习讲英语。

sentences.english: You can join the English Speaking Corner by Jinjiang River near Minshan Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 你可以去锦江河边岷山饭店附近的英语角。

sentences.english: One of the teachers in our department will be the MC at the English Corner.
sentences.chinese: 听力口语部会安排一名教师担任英语角的主持。

sentences.english: Welcome to our English Corner. This comer was set up a year ago.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎来我们英语角，它是在一年前成立的。

sentences.english: This afternoon I joined in the English Corner at the Wuyi Square.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午我参加了五一广场的英语角活动。

sentences.english: I’m planning to go to the English corner.
We also have Morning reading corner, English corner, and Movie theatre.
sentences.chinese: 我们还有晨读角，英语角，电影院等精品活动。

sentences.english: Jiahua has English Corners in the Language Lounge twice a week.
sentences.chinese: 加华每周都在语言活动室里举行两次英语角。

sentences.english: Do you feel bored with the general free-talking style of most English corners?
sentences.chinese: 你是否已厌倦传统自由交谈形式的英语角？

sentences.english: Is there any English corner in Hai Tian Road?
sentences.chinese: 西岗海天路附近有英语角吗？

sentences.english: Friday agin , I know there are many Enlish corners in campus or parks.
sentences.chinese: 今天周五，不少大学或者公园有英语角活动。

definition: (coll.) to sit in on a class
to study outside of class time (reviewing one's lessons)/to study in one's free time/individual study
English Language Teaching (ELT)/studying and teaching English
abbr. for 北京外國語大學|北京外国语大学[Bei3 jing1 Wai4 guo2 yu3 Da4 xue2]
